column3: Social;Pursat:  Police say that a 28-year-old man died after he slipped and fell on his head while climbing at a popular waterfall with friends on the 9 October 2018. The man was from Dey Krahorm village
column6: Pursat province. Witnesses say that the rocks were slippery
column7: and that the man had been drinking before the accident.------https://tvfb.news/article/14942------
